member.name: T:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase
member.summary: Base class to provide batch load capabilities to sessions. Marked abstract because some manipulation of the SAB object is required prior to calling BatchLoad.

member.name: M:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the eventlog and other base properties.

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.SAB
member.summary: A reference to the internal SessionAddressBlock. The client session must be created and logged in prior to calling BatchLoad

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.sponsor
member.summary: A reference to the internal SessionSponsor.

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.messageCallback
member.summary: A reference to the internal MessageCallback

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.eventLogID
member.summary: The eventLogID that will be used for logging

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.sourceModule
member.summary: The sourceModule that will be used for logging

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.fileLocation
member.summary: The fileLocation used for the batch load. Must be set if not defined as 'InputFile' in the config file.

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.exceptionFile
member.summary: The exceptionFile that will be used for the batch load. Defaults to .\exceptionFile.txt if 'ExceptionFile' is not defined in the config file.

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.commitLimit
member.summary: The commitLimit used by batch load. Defaults to 1000 if 'CommitLimit' is not defined in the config file.

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.delimiter
member.summary: The delimiter used by batch load. Defaults to ~. Ignored when processing .XML files.

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.autoAddCharacteristics
member.summary: Identifies is characteristics are to be auto added

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.characteristicDelimiter
member.summary: The delimiter used to delimite characteristic types from values. Defaults to \.

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.UseCharacteristicTransaction
member.summary: Indicates whether the newer transaction types ("S", "C") will be used. Defaults to False.

member.name: P:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.processId
member.summary: The processId that will be used to initalize the ClientServerSession. Defaults to -1.

member.name: M:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.BatchLoad(MIDRetail.Business.IBatchLoadData)
member.summary: Performs a batch load. Will pass the file specified by the fileLocation property with the delimiter and commitLimit specified to the passed in batchSession.
member.param: Any class that implements the BatchLoadData interface
member.returns: True on success, false on failure

member.name: M:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.LoadBase.ProcessArgs(System.String[])
member.summary: Performs a BatchLoad. Takes an args list typically entered from the command line and extracts the appropriate parameters for use in calling the passed batch session objects Load method. Un-set args will be loaded from the configuration file.
member.param: Any class that implements the BatchLoadData interface
member.returns: True on success, false on failure

member.name: T:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.StoreLoad
member.summary: The StoreLoad class in a console application that calls StoreLoadWorker class that performs the actual functionality

member.name: M:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.StoreLoad.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: M:MIDRetail.StoreLoad.StoreLoadWorker.#ctor
member.summary: Used to construct an instance of the class.
